net.co.java.server

Class Server.AuthServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.co.java.server.AbstractServer
      • net.co.java.server.Server.AuthServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.concurrent.Executor
    Enclosing class:
    Server

    public class Server.AuthServer
extends AbstractServer
    The Authentication Server handles user login requests and allows the client to connect to the Game Server. The Authentication Server listens at port 9958 by default.
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling, Thomas Gmelig Meyling

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server.AuthServer

        public Server.AuthServer()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Construct a new AuthServer listening at the default port (9958). Starts listening automatically from a new thread.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when failing to start the server
